message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this great product for a special introductory price of $230. It's a fantastic deal!
I'm interested in the product, but $230 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $120?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $230 is my ideal price point, I could come down to $190 for you.  I believe this product will be a valuable asset to you.
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. Would you be willing to consider a price of $160?
